about_the_game:
This is the DEMO for Tower Of Wishes 3. It contains first 14 Levels of the game.
Tower of Wishes 3: Japan is a match 3 game that tells the story of Ryu, a skilled ninja who is on the run, being pursued by his own clan. Unable to shake off the relentless pursuit, Ryu decides to seek his destiny in climbing the Tower Of Wishes.

An ancient legend speaks of a tower that grants wishes to those who can climb it. For Ryu, the Tower of Wishes may be the only hope left.

The stunning Japanese style artwork and immersive soundtrack transports players to a world of ancient Ninja lore and mystical powers.

With 100 challenging match 3 levels, a rich storyline, fun minigames and customizable gameplay options, Tower of Wishes 3: Japan offers a unique blend of match 3 puzzles, strategy, and fun.

Do you have what it takes to reach the top of the tower and make your wish come true?
